products.name: Plain bubbles
products.description: These are the plain bubbles! They are as plain as they get!

products.name: Wild bubbles
products.description: These are the wild bubbles! They form various shapes as found in the wild! Look out! It's a bubble bear!

products.name: Triple bubbles
products.description: These are the triple bubbles! A guarantee of three bubbles each blow and it never fails! Never!

products.name: Bubblegum bubba-bubbles
products.description: The infamous Bubblegum bubba-bubbles! They smell like bubblegum and they even taste like bubblegum! If you manage to catch them, you can eat them and they will turn into bubblegum! Amazing!

products.name: Dark matter
products.description: The Dark Matter bubbles are unique and a new hit! They are black as the night and heavy as well, so they don't float! They sink!

products.name: Christmas bubbles
products.description: The seasonal Christmas bubbles are right around the corner! They come in white, green and red!
